channel.title: codin on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in codin on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Side effects
item.description: 18:43 Tuesday 25 August 2015 JST There were two multiple side effects that caused a problem with the live AB server the other day. I wrote some code, tested it and found it working perfectly. Added another function call above that code and tested it. Also worked perfectly. Testing complete! Ship it! Fortunately, I had asked the client to call me before she ran the code the first time. I checked the output and … hmmm half of the changes didn’t get made.
